name: The Moot I: The Experimental Mace
description: First comes the huntâ€”the matching of martial prowess against the bestial cunning. Mighty creatures roam the land, and as you stalk them, consider their place, in these initial steps to creating the legendary precursor known as The Energizer. Hurry! Before someone gets eaten!
locked_text: Unlock the Mastery ability Revered Antiquarian in the Legendary Crafting Mastery line, and speak to Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.
